title: Release of Minecraft 1.0.0
content: The official release of Minecraft! Includes Survival mode, monsters, and crafting.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.1 (Adventure Update)
content: The Adventure Update introduces new world height, biomes, and more.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.2 (The Update That Added Iron Golems)
content: This update brings new AI, new blocks, and other improvements.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.3 (The Update That Added Trading)
content: This update introduces trading, adventure mode, and more.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.4 (The Pretty Scary Update)
content: Adds Wither, bats, beacons, zombie villagers, and more!

title: Release of Minecraft 1.5 (The Redstone Update)
content: Focuses on improvements to Redstone mechanics and new Redstone components.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.6.1 (The Horse Update)
content: Introduces horses, leads, carpets, and more.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.7 (The Update that Changed the World)
content: Major changes to world generation, new biomes, and improved structures.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.8 (The Bountiful Update)
content: Adds ocean monuments, slime blocks, banners, and more.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.9 (The Combat Update)
content: Overhauls the combat system with dual wielding, shields, and new attack mechanics.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.10 (The Frostburn Update)
content: Adds polar bears, husks, strays, fossils, and new world generation features.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.11 (The Exploration Update)
content: Focuses on exploration with woodland mansions, llamas, and new advancements.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.12 (The World of Color Update)
content: Adds concrete, glazed terracotta, parrots, and a recipe book.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.13 (The Update Aquatic)
content: Completely overhauls the ocean with new biomes, mobs, and blocks.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.14 (Village & Pillage)
content: Revamps villages, adds pillagers, and new villagers.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.15 (Buzzy Bees)
content: Introduces bees, beehives, and honey blocks.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.16 (Nether Update)
content: Overhauls the Nether dimension with new biomes, mobs, and structures.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.17 (Caves & Cliffs: Part I)
content: Adds axolotls, glow squids, goats, and new blocks related to caves and cliffs.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.18 (Caves & Cliffs: Part II)
content: Expands world generation with larger caves, taller mountains, and new ore distribution.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.19 (The Wild Update)
content: Adds the Deep Dark biome, the Warden, frogs, allays, and mangrove swamps.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.20 (Trails & Tales)
content: Adds the Camel, Cherry Grove biome, archeology, and armor trimming.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.21
content: The new update 1.21 brings improvements to Redstone, new biomes and more mobs.

title: Porcos Launcher Update v1.0 Released!
content: The first official version of Porcos Launcher is now available! Enjoy a streamlined Minecraft experience with easy instance management and more.

title: Instance Management Feature Added
content: Manage multiple Minecraft instances with ease! Create, delete, and switch between instances directly within the launcher.

title: Custom Version Images Now Supported
content: Personalize your Minecraft versions! Set custom images for each installed version to easily identify them.

title: Improved Download Handling for Faster Updates
content: We've optimized the download process! Get your Minecraft updates and mods faster than ever before.

title: Console Output Display Added
content: See what's happening behind the scenes! The launcher now displays real-time console output from Minecraft, helping you diagnose issues.

title: User Settings Now Persisted
content: Your settings are saved! Username, memory allocation, and other preferences are now automatically saved and loaded between sessions.

title: Bug Fix:  Launch Issues Resolved
content: Addressed a critical bug that caused occasional launch failures. The launcher is now more stable and reliable.

title: Upcoming:  Mod Management Integration
content: We're working on integrated mod management! Soon you'll be able to easily install, update, and manage your favorite mods directly within the launcher.

title: Release of Minecraft 1.21.5
content: The new update 1.21.5 brings more reasons to explore both near and far!
